DDoSReporter 1.0.0 Beta documentation

Documentation¶

Documentation of the source codes from DDoSReporter

ddos_reporter.py¶

class ddos_reporter.Ddos_reporter[source]¶

Monitor DoS and DDoS based on data from the access log of the web server Apache.

It counts the number of requests and then it can block the IPs or only send alerts.

print_settings()[source]¶

Prints the actual configuration of DDoSReporter

start_monitoring()[source]¶

Starts monitoring by capturing data from the log access

file_writer.py¶

class file_writer.File_writer[source]¶

Class to write in the log file the new blocked IPs

logAppend(data)[source]¶

Writes in the log file the new blocked IPs

Args:
data (str) - Data to append in the log file

send_email.py¶

class send_email.Send_Email[source]¶

Class to send email to Gmail domain

email_validator(email)[source]¶

Validates an email using regular expression

Args:
email (str) - Email

Returns 1 for valid email and 0 for invalid

send_email(email, ips, atk=0)[source]¶

Send an email alert informing DDoS / Dos

Args:

email (str) - SYSADM email

ips (str) - List of the ips detected

atk (int) - Type of attack detected (0->DoS, 1->DDoS)

version.py¶

version.get_version()[source]¶

Gets the actual version of DDoSReporter

Returns the version of DDoSReporter as String (str)
